main event: A 14-year-old girl reported seeing a large red ball of fire with a long tail moving from east to west in the sky for about 2-3 seconds.
interesting points: The sighting coincided with the release time of the USAF rawinsonde at Newburgh., The witness described the object as 'a large red ball speeding through the heavens.', The object was thought to be a comet by the witness despite its rapid movement., The incident was reported promptly and seemed to fit the characteristics of a solid meteorite., Witnesses included the girl and her two young friends who corroborated her sighting.
witness description: 14-year-old girl and her two friends, all ninth grade students.
